system.description:
Effect: The Terrain type is set to Psychic Terrain for 3 rounds.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Psychic-Type attack on the Active List.

actions.name: Max Mindstorm
actions.description:
Effect: The Terrain type is set to Psychic Terrain for 3 rounds.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
